fields.title: Category
fields.description: A string identifier that groups items together. When an item with a cooldown is used, all items sharing the same category also enter cooldown.

fields.title: Duration
fields.description: The duration of time in seconds that items with the matching category will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.

fields.title: Type
fields.description: The type of action that triggers the cooldown. Use 'use' for items consumed on use, or 'attack' for weapons. Default is 'use'.

description: Adds a cooldown to an item, preventing it from being used again for a specified duration. Items sharing the same category will enter cooldown together when any one of them is used.

generated_doNotEdit.title: Cooldown

fields.title: category
fields.description: The type of cool down for this item. All items with a cool down component with the same category are put on cool down when one is used.

fields.title: duration
fields.description: The duration of time (in seconds) items with a matching category will spend cooling down before becoming usable again.

generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.title: Item Components Cooldown
generatedFromSchema_doNotEdit.description: Adds a cooldown to the item so that, after performing an action of the specified "type", all items with a "minecraft:cooldown" component in the same "category" become unable to perform that same type of action for the number of seconds defined in "duration".

fields.title: Category
fields.description: All items sharing the same "category" are put on cooldown when an action of the specified "type" is performed.

fields.title: Duration
fields.description: Duration of the cooldown, in seconds, before the item can perform an action of the specified "type" again.

fields.title: ItemCooldownType
fields.description: The type of action the cooldown applies to. Options are mutually exclusive, so cooldown for one type of action does not affect the others. Values: "use" (when using an item), "attack" (when attack with an item).
